relevant_findings.neurological: Comatose with intact brain stem reflexes, extensor posturing to nail-bed pressure, symmetric hyperreflexia.
relevant_findings.other: 4-cm healing eschar at vaccination site, leukocytosis (WBC count 312.2 mm³) with elevated absolute neutrophil count (310.7 mm³).

relevant_findings.neurological: Patient began to track with his eyes.
No neurological deficits noted; minor restrictions returning to active duty.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Recovered sufficiently to return to full active duty; minor occasional involuntary right shoulder droop and reproducible numbness and tingling over the dorsal aspect of left hand with pressure.
